name: Fire Emblemâ„¢: The Sacred Stones
description: Original Release Date: May 2005 The kingdom of Renais lies in ruins, shattered by a sudden invasion from a former ally. Guide the royal heirs, Eirika and Ephraim, on their twin quest to rebuild Renais and discover the dark secret behind the war that has torn their homeland apart. Prepare and build your army! Will your cavalier become a paladin, or will he sacrifice speed for power and become a great knight? With multiple class-changes to choose from, how your characters level-up is up to you! Plan your strategy to take advantage of your strengths and exploit your enemy's weaknesses. Guide your soldiers carefully--if they fall in battle, they're gone forever!
